code: import React from'react';export default function ModalOrders(props){var orders=props.customer.orders;function ordersExist(){if(orders){return orders.map(function(o){return React.createElement("div",null,React.createElement("p",{key:o._id},"n* ",o.hazmana," || ",o.amount," nis || ",o.date));});}else return React.createElement("p",null,"Pas de commandes");}return React.createElement("div",{style:{minHeight:'50vh'}},React.createElement("h4",{style:{textAlign:'center'}},"Toutes les commandes"),React.createElement("br",null),ordersExist());}
